statements: DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND location = 'homepage' AND device_type = 'mobile';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND ad_id = 200;
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 101 AND ad_id = 200;
DELETE FROM ad_targeting_algorithms WHERE last_updated < '2022-01-01' AND algorithm_name LIKE '%recommendation%';
DELETE FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM Ads WHERE ad_id = 500 AND ad_target_group = 'young adults';
DELETE FROM Users WHERE user_id = 101 AND user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM AdTargetingMetrics WHERE targeting_metric = 'Gender' AND metric_value >= 0.5;
